title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space**

**Designed in California, USA**

Take your food dehydration to the next level with the COSORI Food Dehydrator, designed in California, USA. With its large drying space and advanced features, this dehydrator is perfect for making delicious jerky, beef, turkey, and chicken strips, as well as drying fruits, vegetables, and herbs.

**Key Features:**

* **Large Drying Space:** 6.48ft² of drying space across 6 stainless steel trays, each measuring 12 x 13 inches
* **Powerful and Quiet:** 600W power rating with a quiet operation of <48dB
* **Advanced Temperature Control:** Digital control panel with a temperature range of 95°F - 165°F (35°C - 73°C) and a timer of up to 48 hours
* **Hot Air Circulation:** Rear fan provides hot air circulation for even drying
* **Safety Features:** Auto shutoff and overheat protection for safe operation
* **Easy Cleaning:** Dishwasher-safe stainless steel trays and accessories
* **Additional Accessories:** Includes 1 mesh screen (10.7 x 11.8 inches) and 1 fruit roll sheet (11.3 x 12.8 inches)

**Specifications:**

* Voltage: 120V, 60Hz
* Applicable regions: USA and Canada
* Glass door with touch-control LED display
* Memory function for easy recall of favorite settings
* Extends shelf life of dehydrated foods

**Recipe Book Included:**

Get started with 50 included recipes and explore the world of dehydrated cuisine. From savory meats to sweet fruits and vegetables, our recipe book will inspire you to try new things and experiment with different flavors and textures.

**Order Now and Start Dehydrating!**

Get your COSORI Food Dehydrator today and start creating delicious, healthy snacks for you and your family.

**COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space**

**Designed in California, Made for Perfect Jerky and More**

Experience the ultimate in food dehydration with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, featuring a spacious 6.48ft² drying area and 6 stainless steel trays. Perfect for making delicious jerky, beef, turkey, or chicken, as well as fruits, vegetables, and even pet treats.

**Powerful and Efficient**

* 600W power rating for fast and even drying
* Hot air circulation from the rear fan ensures consistent results
* Maximum temperature of 165°F (73°C) for perfect jerky and snacks

**Easy to Use and Monitor**

* Digital control panel with touch-control LED display for easy temperature and timer settings
* 48-hour timer with auto shutoff for convenient, worry-free operation
* Temperature control range of 95°F - 165°F (35°C - 73°C) for perfect results

**Safe and Convenient**

* Dishwasher-safe stainless steel trays for easy cleaning
* Quiet operation at <48dB for minimal disturbance
* Overheat protection and auto shutoff for peace of mind

**Additional Features and Accessories**

* Glass door for easy monitoring
* Memory function to recall your favorite settings
* Extends shelf life of your food by preserving nutrients and flavors
* Includes 50 delicious recipes to get you started
* Additional accessories: 1x mesh screen (10.7 x 11.8 in) and 1x fruit roll sheet (11.3 x 12.8 in)

**Technical Specifications**

* Voltage: 120V, 60Hz (compatible with USA and Canada)
* Dimensions: 12 x 13 in (tray size), 17.7 x 13.4 x 12.4 in (overall size)

**Order Now and Start Enjoying Perfectly Dehydrated Food!**

Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space**

**Designed in California, USA**

Take your food dehydration to the next level with the COSORI Food Dehydrator, designed and engineered in California, USA. This powerful and feature-rich dehydrator is perfect for making jerky, beef, turkey, and chicken, as well as drying fruits, vegetables, and herbs.

**Large Drying Space**

With 6 spacious stainless steel trays, each measuring 12 x 13 inches, you'll have a total drying space of 6.48ft² to accommodate all your favorite foods. The trays are dishwasher safe, making cleanup a breeze.

**Advanced Features**

* 600W power rating for fast and efficient drying
* Hot air circulation from the rear fan for even drying
* Digital control panel with touch-control LED display for easy operation
* Temperature control: 95°F - 165°F (35°C - 73°C) with a max temperature of 165°F (73°C)
* Timer: 30 minutes to 48 hours for customized drying time
* Memory function to store your favorite settings
* Extends shelf life of your food by removing moisture and preserving nutrients

**Safety Features**

* Auto shutoff for added safety and peace of mind
* Overheat protection to prevent overheating and damage to the unit

**Additional Accessories**

* 1 x Mesh screen (10.7 x 11.8 inches) for drying small or delicate items
* 1 x Fruit roll sheet (11.3 x 12.8 inches) for making fruit leather and roll-ups
* 50 included recipes to get you started on your dehydration journey

**Technical Specifications**

* Voltage: 120V, 60Hz (USA and Canada compatible)
* Noise level: <48dB for quiet operation
* Glass door for easy viewing and monitoring

**Order Now and Start Dehydrating Your Favorite Foods!**
